post.body: @meghankathleen @levyj413 devil's adv: what's diff btw 1 org tweeter and a press release? (besides word count and interaction)
um YES do eeeet.
@cheeky_geeky @levyj413 Barrier No.1: gov't still obsessed with PDFs. whyyy? (good stuff though. printing out for me+manager :))
Yeah! I wish Twitter kept track of convos like that a little better/I could figure out how to organize them effectively
....also, how to use @USArmy delicious account in a useful way.... www.delicious.com/soldiersmediacenter
Yay! Thanks for this. Struggling to get myself to think more strategically about this kind of stuff.
oh no!! now I have all three songs competing for head space! At least I haven't heard banana phone in a while....:D
ah! i miss clementine's somehow. I kinda miss old-school sketchy main street bar more though...hmmm...
WOOHOO!! Got my very 1st iPod - used - from @meghankathleen and other coworker who STOLE it from me during White Elephant. yaaaaay! so nice!
i now have FIVE half-plans for new years. what to do? new york, dc, board games, jmu, or rosslyn? dilEMMAs dilEMMAs. my life is SO hard.
Mmmm San Diego companies keep following me (like @FashionChateau - cute name!). It's like they know I lust after their city.
This little girl is so precious: http://bit.ly/7bnY
(Stuck-in-head udpate: B.Spears "Gimme More" thanks to @johnheiner) I heart Arrrrrmy.mil coworkers.
Mmmmmmm @kristinandrews found vanilla ice cream!
Trying out www.imeem.com at the suggestion of @meghankathleen. Got sick of Jango and no Pandora at work :( :( Currently: the Books
Uploading spreadsheets to Google Docs because our new employees haven't gotten Microsoft Office yet.
Hrmmm, I really don't like chai tea lattes as much as I thought I did. /randomtweetsfortheday
I really wish Ididn't have "sliegh ride" stuck in my head. It's better than the "give the gift of scratchers" song, though.
Impressive: GMail kept track of my GChat convos, even though I was using Pidgin! (Now where does Pidgin hide AIM convos?) OKAY BED TIME!!
Thinking about the value i add/my audience here on Twitter. Must curb my desire to word-vomit about "dating."
